case-cancellation.html_body:
Dear customer

We are contacting you to let you know that we have cancelled your case {{ case.reference }}.

 

Kind regards

Norwich City Council
case-cancellation.subject: Your case has been cancelled
case-cancellation.text_body: Dear customerWe are contacting you to let you know that we have cancelled your case {{ case.reference }}.  Kind regards Norwich City Council
case-cancellation.title: Case cancellation

delivered.html_body: Replacement bin / container delivered: Your {{case.values.container_type_rpelacement.label}} has been delivered to your property. Your reference for this enquiry is {{ case.reference }}.
delivered.subject: Delivered
delivered.text_body: Replacement bin / container delivered: Your {{case.values.container_type_rpelacement.label}} has been delivered to your property. Your reference for this enquiry is {{ case.reference }}.
delivered.title: Delivered

delivery-instructions.html_body: Thank you for your request. We have ordered {{case.values.container_type_rpelacement}} and this will be delivered to your property within the next 7-10 days Your reference for this enquiry is {{ case.reference }}
delivery-instructions.subject: Norwich City Council - Delivery instructions
delivery-instructions.text_body: Thank you for your request. We have ordered {{case.values.container_type_rpelacement}} and this will be delivered to your property within the next 7-10 days Your reference for this enquiry is {{ case.reference }}
delivery-instructions.title: Delivery instructions
